Text: Catherine O'Hara:  She is known for her comedy work on "Second City Television" (1976–84) and in films such as "After Hours" (1985), "Beetlejuice" (1988), "Home Alone" (1990), "" (1992), and "The Nightmare Before Christmas" (1993).

Text: Catherine O'Hara:  Her other film appearances include the mockumentary films written and directed by Christopher Guest: "Waiting for Guffman" (1996), "Best in Show" (2000), "A Mighty Wind" (2003), and "For Your Consideration" (2006).
